snippet: The DeltaWing is arguably the most innovative racecar to appear in years. By minimizing aerodynamic drag and cutting weight, it is roughly as fast as cars that have twice as much horsepower.
abstract: Unusual-looking DeltaWing racecar may be most innovative and most polarizing design to appear in years; by minimizing aerodynamic drag and cutting weight, car is roughly as fast as those that have twice as much horsepower.
lead_paragraph: The DeltaWing is arguably the most innovative racecar to appear in years. By minimizing aerodynamic drag and cutting weight, it is roughly as fast as cars that have twice as much horsepower.

headline.seo: Last in Beauty Contests May Be First on Tracks
headline.main: Last in Beauty Contests May Be First on Tracks
headline.print_headline: Last in Beauty Contests May Be First on Tracks
